page.title: 20WILBERFOSS LOCAL INFORMATION
page.content: The Wilberfoss "Newsletter" is issued monthly. Its purpose it to let people know what is going on in the village, such as tennis club, weight-watching and keep fit classes. It also advertises local businesses and services such as hairdresing, rubbish clearance, plumbing and handy- man etc. In its pages can also be found details of the village football team's latest disaster and points of view on matters of village interest. Strong feelings were recently expressed on the vandalisation of the bus shelter. The parish magazine "Focus" also comes out monthly and informs people in the parish about events, services and other activities such as family outings connected with the church. There have been articles by a local historian about the C12th church.
